name: Storytellers Cafe
location: Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa, Disney's Grand Californian Hotel & Spa

items.title: Limited Menu
items.description: Storytellers Cafe is temporarily closed for refurbishment for a few weeks. During the time of closure, Mickey’s Tales of Adventure Breakfast Buffet and Brunch will be available in the Trillium Room. Celebrate with Mickey Mouse and some of his closest pals. A limited menu will be available. Please see location for available offerings.

items.title: $55 per adult, plus tax
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.

items.title: $33 per child (3-9), plus tax
items.description: Menu Items, Pricing, and Hours are subject to change without notice.
